thread.title: Sandra

author: Sandra
title: Sandra
text: This was my first experience with Willis Orchards and therefore unfamiliar with the wait time to get the products. Now have more knowledge of the process industry wide (living in Florida I forget other parts of the nation actually have a very cold winter season). After a wait time, I received my product and am so excited about my Blueberry plant. It took off very quickly, has lots of new growth and is even flowering! Just referred my sister to Willis Orchards. Thank you all for what you do.
